TopicTitle: Can the KSC Structures be Destroyed in 1.8.1?

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if I messed up the default settings or if for some reason the Structures can not be destroyed in this Version 1.8.1.

I haven't up graded to 1.9.1 yet and I was trying to destroy one of the Tanks for filming and it's not happening.

Has anyone come across this or prove it for me?

30 minutes ago, Castille7 said:

I'm not sure if I messed up the default settings or if for some reason the Structures can not be destroyed in this Version 1.8.1.

I haven't up graded to 1.9.1 yet and I was trying to destroy one of the Tanks for filming and it's not happening.

Has anyone come across this or prove it for me?

They have been changed to make that harder; In difficulty settings, in the pause menu under settings, in one of the tabs, there is a slider that controls how weak the KSC buildings are (it is 0.05 by default). If you want easily breakable buildings, slide it up to 1.

(I do not have KSP on. As soon as I turn it on, I will tell you exactly where this slider is.)
